      • SServer

        public SServer​(java.lang.String host,
               int port,
               int timeoutConnect,
               int timeoutOperations)
        Set host, port and timeout for connect and timeout for operations.
        Parameters:
        host - String host, example: 127.0.0.1 or example.com.
        port - int port.
        timeoutConnect - timeout for connection.
        timeoutOperations - timeout for send message.
